targets.expr: sum by (job, instance, ip_version, subnet_name) (openstack_neutron_network_ip_availabilities_used{job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"}) / sum by (job, instance, ip_version, subnet_name)(openstack_neutron_network_ip_availabilities_total{job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"})

panels.title: IPs used by subnets
